title: En Kanmani Un Kadhali Lyrics Chittu Kuruvi
stanzas:
en kanmani un kadhali 
ilamaangani
unai paarthadhum
sirikindrathe 
naan sonna jokai kaetu
naanamo 
nee nagaichuvai 
mannan illaiyo

en mannavan un kadhalan
enai paarthathum
orraayiram kadhai solgran
ammammaa innum ketka thoondumo
nee rasikindra 
kanni illaiyo

en kanmani ...

iru maangal pesum podhu
mozhi yethammaa..
pirar kadhil ketpadharkkum
vazhi yethammaa..

oru jodi serndhu sellum
payanangalil
uravandri veru illai
gavangalil

ila maamayil 
arugaamayil
vandhaadum velai
inbam kodi endru 
anubavam sollavillayo

en mannavan un kadhalan
enai paarthathum
orraayiram kadhai solgraan
ammammaa innum ketka thoondumo
rasikindra kanni illaiyo

en kanmani ...

medhuvaaga unnai konjam 
thodavendume
irumeni engum viralgal
pada vendume

adharkkaaga neram ondru
vara vendume
adaiyaala chinnam
ondru tharavendume

iru tholilum manamaalaigal
kondaadum kaalam endru
koodumendru 
thavikkindra thavippennavo. 

en kanmani un kadhali 
ilamaangani
unai paarthadhum
sirikindrathe 
naan sonna jokai kaetu
naanamo 
nee nagaichuvai 
mannan illaiyo

en mannavan un kadhalan
enai paarthathum
orraayiram kadhai solgran
ammammaa innum ketka thoondumo
nee rasikindra 
kanni illaiyo

en kanmani ...
